ygData.subject: Re: Getting a starter kit...
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks fer the info... but i think AGNOSTIC is no longer an option... unlesss they decides to change it again somehow... so... i will be KOS until sometime
ygData.messageBody:
thanks fer the info... but i think AGNOSTIC is no longer an option... unlesss they decides to change it again somehow... so... i will be KOS until sometime later...

i have gone to a web site telling me killing certain things and their effects ... faction hits and stuff like that.... and i will work on em as soon as i get to a reasonable level... like 8... :) and i dont think i will wanna go far until im like 12... or even later... ill see what or how i can managed my starting area first....

thank again..
----- Original Message -----
From: Entreri
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 2:26 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Getting a starter kit...


As a DarkElf necro,here are somethings u need to know once u head to Ecommons[around level8+,u can go]

-Altunic Jartin-dont mess with this npc..he kills necros on sight,see him?RUN!
-nearby got orc camp..kill alot of these to gain faction
-inn3's one section,lady will sell/buy things from u
-after lotsa orc kills,inn3[whole]will be available for u to buy/sell so now u can buy food supplies from inn3
-after dunno how 1#@$%^& ...time[which I still cannot]all inns might accept u
-at netulos forest-got 2 skele spawn points,one cross the bridge and another near a pyamid..this should get u thru from 5-8 easily

if u can choose agnostic,BEST..u can go anyway at start and altunic wont KOS u although u still have to kill orcs so that u can buy things from inn3

Some armor will be good... a staff will be even better... heee... n gold... all the more even better... kekekekke...

cheers,
Fred
